GSD.product_version: versions from v4.14 to before v4.19.224
GSD.description:
binder: fix async_free_space accounting for empty parcels

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.224 by commit 7c7064402609aeb6fb11be1b4ec10673ff17b593, it was introduced in version v4.14 by commit 74310e06be4d74dcf67cd108366710dee5c576d5. For more details please see the references link.
